title: France panorama. [No. 69/39]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Shells vs gravity - empty space experiments at the ONERA. 2. Youth and alpinism - Chamonix’ new climbing school. 3. Dog-training a la Francaise - the opening of hunting season. Training the hounds. 4. Glass and crystal - Cesar at the Daum Crystal-Works in Nancy. 5. The arts - an exhibition entitled “Renior and his friends” in Troyes.
